The severity of air pollution in China has rattled Chinese leaders. While they have, on occasion, closed factories and restricted traffic to clear the air for special events, so far they have lacked the will or the capacity to reduce air pollution on a sustained basis.

3 Male fish, Last of Their Kind, Must Find a Mate or Go Extinct - London Zoo is home to 2 of 3 Mangarahara cichlids known to exist. "We're urgently appealing to anyone who owns or knows someone who may own these critically endangered fish, which are silver with an orange-tipped tail."
